articles.title: Euro Cup: Italy and England go to extra time at Euro 2020 - CTV News
articles.description: Italy won the European Championship for the second time by beating England 3-2 on penalties on Sunday. The match finished 1-1 after extra time.
articles.content:
LONDON -- 
Italian soccer's redemption story is complete. England's painful half-century wait for a major title goes on.
And it just had to be because of a penalty shootout.
